eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST for the following counties or areas: Lincoln, OR; at 11:04 AM ON JAN 7, 2026 Effective until 12:04 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a coordinated monthly test of the Emergency Alert System for the communities of Lincoln County, Oregon in cooperation with Public Safety, Broadcasters and Cable Operators. This system informs you of events that pose an immediate threat to your life, health and property. If this had been an actual emergency, requiring immediate action or evacuation, an official message would follow the attention tones you just heard. This test will conclude in five seconds.
